text: I'm imagining top-to-bottom execution that allows redefinition of variables as in the REPL.

elements.text: I'm imagining top-to-bottom execution that allows redefinition of variables as in the REPL.

text: To be clear, my understanding is that Neptune and IJulia both require one to explicitly run each cell. I.e. they are not reactive. I'm fine with the reactive part, I just want top-to-bottom ordering, and also redefinition of variables (since top-to-bottom gives these a specific order in which to execute).

elements.text: To be clear, my understanding is that Neptune and IJulia both require one to explicitly run each cell. I.e. they are not reactive.
